headline: Robinhood Broadens Beyond Brokerage With MIAXdx Stake And Robinhood Chain
summary: Robinhood Markets (NasdaqGS:HOOD) is expanding beyond trading with new product rollouts, including a move into prediction markets. The company has acquired a majority stake in MIAXdx, a derivatives exchange, as part of this broader push. Robinhood is also launching its Ethereum Layer 2 network, called Robinhood Chain, to support on chain activity tied to its platform. These moves come while Robinhood manages a challenging crypto backdrop and a transition in its chief financial officer...

headline: How Recent Moves Are Reshaping The Story Behind Robinhood Markets’s Valuation
summary: What Changed in the Latest Fair Value Update The latest valuation work on Robinhood Markets has trimmed the fair value estimate from US$151.55 to US$132.19, even as long term revenue growth assumptions move from 13.01% to 17.91%. This reflects research that is balancing stronger potential from new products like the MIAXdx joint venture and the planned UK stocks and shares ISA with a more cautious stance on what that future should be worth today. Stay tuned to see how you can keep on top of...
